channel.title: Command help

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

So I have the ::getpass command, but it doesn’t work.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("getpass") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; sM("Succesful password recovery!"); sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME"); } }

I need some help, if you could post yours, etc?

It’s delta.

Read full topic
